Description: Monitoring of position deviation.The system verifies whether the drive is within thedefined deviation during the period set with MON_ChkTime.The status can be output via a parameterizableoutput.The minimum value, the factory setting and themaximum value depend on the scaling factor.Modified settings become active immediately.Available with firmware version ≥V01.03.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3006:3FhModbus 1662Profibus 1662CIP 106.1.63ModbusTCP 1662EtherCAT 3006:3FhPROFINET 1662

Description: Monitoring of time window.Adjustment of a time for monitoring of positiondeviation, velocity deviation, velocity value andcurrent value. If the monitored value is in thepermissible range during the adjusted time, themonitoring function delivers a positive result.The status can be output via a parameterizableoutput.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3006:1DhModbus 1594Profibus 1594CIP 106.1.29ModbusTCP 1594EtherCAT 3006:1DhPROFINET 1594
